flowRoot.flowPara: knowing the coordinates of A and B and the lengths AB and BC,
what are the coordinates of C?
We also need the coordinate of D, a point located on the same side as C compare to (AB)
Knowing a line equation and a circle (center and radius), what are the coordiantes of the intersection?
Knowing a Line AB, what are the coordinates of Q, distant of q from AB?
Knowing a line equation AB and the coordinate of a point M, what are the coordinates of the point P, projection of M on AB?
PM line equation: b*x-a*y+d=0, with d = -(b*Mx-a*My)
P is the intersection of (AB) and (PM)
